channel.title: CVE Feed for CrossedCode -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CrossedCode -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49228|2024-10-18T12:46:35.375Z -- crossedcode -- bverse%20convert
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CrossedCode bVerse Convert allows Stored XSS.This issue affects bVerse Convert: from n/a through 1.3.7.1.
